metadata.title: CVE-2022-46303 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Command injection in SMS notifications in Tribe29 Checkmk <= 2.1.0p10,Checkmk <= 2.0.0p27, and Checkmk <= 1.6.0p29 allows an attacker with UserManagement permissions, as well as LDAP administrators in certainscenarios, to perform arbitrary commands within the context of theapplication's local permissions.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
